trans-unit.source: A Boolean indicating whether events of this type will be dispatched to the registered listenerbefore being dispatched to any EventTarget beneath it in the DOM tree. Events that are bubbling upward through the tree will not trigger a listener designated to use capture. Event bubbling and capturing are two ways of propagating events which occur in an element that is nested within another element, when both elements have registered a handle for that event. The event propagation mode determines the order in which elements receive the event. See DOM Level 3 Events and JavaScript Event order for a detailed explanation. If not specified, useCapture defaults to false.

A controlling user agentfires a trusted event named connectionavailable on a PresentationRequest when a connection associated with the object is created. trans-unit.source: A CSSStyleSheet object is created and inserted into the document's styleSheets list automatically by the browser, when a style sheet is loaded for a document. As the document.styleSheets list cannot be modified directly, there's no useful way to create a new CSSStyleSheet object manually (although Constructable Stylesheet Objects might get added to the Web APIs at some point). trans-unit.source: A DOMException thrown if the specified index doesn't correspond to an existing range.

trans-unit.source: A DOMPoint object represents a 2D or 3D point in a coordinate system; it includes values for the coordinates in up to three dimensions, as well as an optional perspective value. DOMPoint is based on DOMPointReadOnly but allows its properties' values to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMPoint 对象表示的坐标系的2D或3D点; 它包括最多三个维度的坐标值，以及可选的透视值。 DOMPoint 基于 DOMPointReadOnly ,但允许更改其属性的值。

trans-unit.source: A DOMQuad is a collection of four DOMPoints defining the corners of an arbitrary quadrilateral. Returning DOMQuads lets getBoxQuads() return accurate information even when arbitrary 2D or 3D transforms are present. It has a handy bounds attribute returning a DOMRectReadOnly for those cases where you just want an axis-aligned bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMQuad 为四的集合 DOMPoint 小号限定的任意四边形的角上。返回 DOMQuad 可以使 getBoxQuads() 返回准确的信息，即使存在任意2D或3D变换也是如此。对于那些只需要轴对齐的边界矩形的情况，它具有方便的 bounds 属性，可返回 DOMRectReadOnly 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMRect represents a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMRect 表示的矩形。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containing the format-specific parameters field from the "a=fmtp" line in the codec's SDP, if one is present; see section 5.8 of the IETF specification for JSEP.

trans-unit.source: A fetch event fires every time any resource controlled by a service worker is fetched, which includes the documents inside the specified scope, and any resources referenced in those documents (for example if index.html makes a cross origin request to embed an image, that still goes through its service worker.)

trans-unit.source: A float giving the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, when this event fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an "animationstart" event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containing (-1 * delay). It defaults to 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个 float 给动画已经运行，在几秒钟内，当这个事件发射，不包括动画暂停任何时候的时间量。对于 "animationstart" 事件，除非 animation-delay 的值为负，否则 elapsedTime 为 0.0 ，在这种情况下，将使用 elapsedTime 包含 (-1 * delay ) 的事件来触发该事件。默认为 0.0 。

trans-unit.source: A float indicating the amount of time the animation has been running, in seconds, as of the time the event was fired, excluding any time the animation was paused. For an "animationstart" event, elapsedTime is 0.0 unless there was a negative value for animation-delay, in which case the event will be fired with elapsedTime containing (-1 * delay).

trans-unit.source: A float that represents the amount of pressure the user is applying to the touch surface. This is a value between 0.0 (no pressure) and 1.0 (the maximum amount of pressure the hardware can recognize). A value of 0.0 is returned if no value is known (for example the touch device does not support this property). In environments where force is known, the absolute pressure represented by the force attribute, and the sensitivity in levels of pressure, may vary.
trans-unit.target: 甲 float 表示的压力的量的用户被施加到触摸表面。这是介于 0.0 （无压力）和 1.0 （硬件可以识别的最大压力）之间的值。如果未知，则返回值 0.0 （例如，触摸设备不支持此属性）。在已知力的环境中，由力属性表示的绝对压力以及压力水平的灵敏度可能会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: A popstate event is dispatched to the window each time the active history entry changes between two history entries for the same document. If the activated history entry was created by a call to history.pushState(), or was affected by a call to history.replaceState(), the popstate event's state property contains a copy of the history entry's state object.
trans-unit.target: 每次活动历史记录条目在同一文档的两个历史记录条目之间更改时，都会将 popstate 事件调度到窗口。如果激活的历史记录条目是由对 history.pushState() 的调用创建的，或者受到了对 history.replaceState() 的调用的影响，则 popstate 事件的 state 属性包含历史记录条目的state对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: A non-standard extension added in Chrome, this property provides an object with basic memory usage information. You should not use this non-standard API.

trans-unit.source: A pointer is a hardware agnostic representation of input devices (such as a mouse, pen or contact point on a touch-enable surface). The pointer can target a specific coordinate (or set of coordinates) on the contact surface such as a screen.
trans-unit.target: 甲指针是输入设备（诸如上的触摸使能表面上的鼠标，笔或接触点）的硬件无关的表示。指针可以在诸如屏幕的接触表面上瞄准特定坐标（或一组坐标）。

trans-unit.source: A source node has zero inputs but one or multiple outputs, and can be used to generate sound. On the other hand, a destination node has no outputs; instead, all its inputs are directly played back on the speakers (or whatever audio output device the audio context uses). In addition, there are processing nodes which have inputs and outputs. The exact processing done varies from one AudioNode to another but, in general, a node reads its inputs, does some audio-related processing, and generates new values for its outputs, or simply lets the audio pass through (for example in the AnalyserNode, where the result of the processing is accessed separately).
trans-unit.target: 甲源节点具有零个输入，但一个或多个输出，并且可以被用于产生声音。另一方面，目标节点没有输出。取而代之的是，其所有输入都直接在扬声器（或音频环境使用的任何音频输出设备）上播放。另外，还有具有输入和输出的处理节点。从一个 AudioNode 到另一个AudioNode，完成的确切处理各不相同，但通常，一个节点读取其输入，进行一些与音频相关的处理，并为其输出生成新值，或者只是让音频通过（例如，在 AnalyserNode 中，分别访问处理结果的位置）。

trans-unit.source: A shader is a program, written using the OpenGL ES Shading Language (GLSL), that takes information about the vertices that make up a shape and generates the data needed to render the pixels onto the screen: namely, the positions of the pixels and their colors.
trans-unit.target: 甲着色器是一个程序，使用写入的OpenGL ES着色语言（GLSL），即大约需要，使一个形状的顶点信息，并产生需要的像素渲染到屏幕上的数据，即：像素和的位置其颜色。

trans-unit.source: A writable stream is a destination into which you can write data, represented in JavaScript by a WritableStream object. This serves as an abstraction over the top of an underlying sink — a lower-level I/O sink into which raw data is written.
trans-unit.target: 甲写流是目的地可以在其中通过将数据写入，在JavaScript表示 WritableStream 对象。这是对基础接收器（在其上写入原始数据的较低级别I / O接收器）顶部的抽象。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean attribute indicating if the audio asset must be replayed when the end of the AudioBuffer is reached. Its default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔属性，指示在到达 AudioBuffer 的末尾时是否必须重播音频资产。其默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that, when true, disables all WebGL extensions. This is false by default.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean property that, when true, enables a minimum capability mode. When in this mode, WebGL is configured to only support the bare minimum feature set and capabilities required by the WebGL specification. This lets you ensure that your WebGL code will work on any device or browser, regardless of their capabilities. This is false by default.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔属性，当为 true 时，启用最低能力模式。在这种模式下，WebGL被配置为仅支持WebGL规范要求的最低限度的功能集和功能。这使您可以确保您的WebGL代码可以在任何设备或浏览器上运行，无论其功能如何。默认情况下为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating the ideal, but not required, value the property should ideally have. If possible, this value will be used, but the user agent will use the other value if it needs to in order to come up with a workable configuration.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示该属性的理想值,但不是必需值。如果可能的话,这个值将被使用,但如果需要的话,用户代理将使用另一个值,以便得出一个可行的配置。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the RTCPeerConnection should generate new values for the connection's ice-ufrag and ice-pwd values, which will trigger ICE renegotiation on the next message sent to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示 RTCPeerConnection 是否应为连接的ice-ufrag和ice-pwd值生成新值，这将在发送给远程对等方的下一条消息上触发ICE重新协商。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the alt key was down when the touch event was fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当触摸事件被触发时,alt键是否被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the battery is currently being charged.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示电池当前是否正在充电。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the connection should use voice detection once running. The default value, true, indicates that the user agent should monitor the audio coming from the microphone or other audio source and automatically cease transmitting data or mute when the user isn't speaking into the microphone,
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示连接在运行后是否应使用语音检测。默认值 true ，指示用户代理应监视来自麦克风或其他音频源的音频，并在用户未对着麦克风讲话时自动停止发送数据或将其静音，

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the control key was down when the touch event was fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当触摸事件被触发时,控制键是否被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the device's battery is currently being charged.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示设备的电池当前是否正在充电。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the event can bubble across the boundary between the shadow DOM and the regular DOM.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示事件是否可以跨越影子DOM和常规DOM之间的边界冒泡。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the meta key was down when the touch event was fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当触摸事件被触发时,元键是否被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the prior value of a changed attribute should be included in the MutationObserver.oldValue property when reporting attribute value changes. If true, oldValue is set accordingly. If false, it is not.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示在报告属性值更改时是否应在 MutationObserver.oldValue 属性中包含已更改属性的先前值。如果为 true ，则会相应地设置 oldValue 。如果为 false ，则不是。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the shift key was down when the touch event was fired.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当触控事件被触发时,shift键是否按下。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not to call the observer's callback function when textual nodes' values change.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示当文本节点的值发生变化时,是否要调用观察者的回调函数。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not to invoke the callback function when new nodes are added to or removed from the section of the DOM being monitored.. If subtree is false, only the node indicated by the observer's target node is monitored for changes. Setting subtree to true causes addition or removal of nodes anywhere within the subtree rooted at target to be reported.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示在将新节点添加到要监视的DOM部分或从中删除新节点时是否调用回调函数。如果 subtree 为 false ，则仅监视观察者目标节点指示的节点的更改。将 subtree 设置为 true 会导致在以要报告的 target 为根的子树中的任何位置添加或删除节点。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not to report through the callback any changes to the values of attributes on the node or nodes being monitored. The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否通过回调报告对受监视的一个或多个节点上的属性值的任何更改。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not to set the MutationRecord's oldValue property to be a string containing the value of the character node's contents prior to the change represented by the mutation record.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示是否将 MutationRecord 的 oldValue 属性设置为包含由突变记录表示的更改之前字符节点的内容的值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether or not voice activity is included in the last RTP packet played from the source. If the peer has indicated that it's not supporting voice activity detection, this field is not provided.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示语音活动是否包括在从源播放的最后一个RTP数据包中。如果对等体已表示不支持语音活动检测,则不提供此字段。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value set to true if the end of the stream has been reached. This has been removed from the specification; you should instead check the value of MediaStreamTrack.readyState to see if its value is "ended" for the track or tracks you want to ensure have finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 如果已到达流的末尾，则将布尔值设置为 true 。这已从规范中删除；您应该改为检查 MediaStreamTrack.readyState 的值，以查看您要确保已完成播放的一个或多个轨道的值是否为 "ended" 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that returns true if the MediaStream is active, or false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果 MediaStream 处于活动状态，则返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that returns true if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果已到达流的末尾，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which controls whether or not the audio track's sound is enabled. Setting this value to false mutes the track's audio.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，控制是否启用音轨的声音。将此值设置为 false 将使轨道的音频静音。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which controls whether or not the video track is active. Only a single video track can be active at any given time, so setting this property to true for one track while another track is active will make that other track inactive.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，它控制视频轨道是否处于活动状态。在任何给定时间，只有一个视频轨道可以处于活动状态，因此，将一个轨道设置为 true ，而将另一轨道激活则将其设为非活动状态。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which indicates whether the target element has transitioned into a state of intersection (true) or out of a state of intersection (false).
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指示 target 元素是已转换为相交状态（ true ）还是已脱离相交状态（ false ）。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the document and the elements within can be placed into full-screen mode by calling Element.requestFullscreen(). If full-screen mode isn't available, this value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果可以通过调用 Element.requestFullscreen() 将文档及其中的元素置于全屏模式，则为 true 。如果无法使用全屏模式，则此值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the document has an element currently being displayed in full-screen mode; otherwise, this returns false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果文档具有当前以全屏模式显示的元素，则为 true ;否则为false。否则，返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the document is currently displaying an element in full-screen mode; otherwise, the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果文档当前以全屏模式显示元素，则为 true ;否则为false。否则，该值为 false.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the event has not been canceled; otherwise, if the event has been canceled or the default has been prevented, the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果尚未取消事件，则为 true ;否则为false。否则，如果事件已被取消或默认值已被阻止，则该值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the input track has noise suppression enabled or false if AGC is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果输入轨道启用了噪声抑制，则为 true ;如果禁用AGC，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the stream is currently active; otherwise, the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果流当前处于活动状态，则为 true ;否则为false。否则，值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the target element intersects with the intersection observer's root. If this is true, then, the IntersectionObserverEntry describes a transition into a state of intersection; if it's false, then you know the transition is from intersecting to not-intersecting.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果目标元素与相交观察者的根相交，则为 true 。如果为 true ，则 IntersectionObserverEntry 描述到相交状态的转换；如果为 false ，则您知道过渡是从相交到不相交。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the track has automatic gain control enabled or false if AGC is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果轨道启用了自动增益控制，则为 true ;如果禁用AGC，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the track has echo cancellation functionality enabled or false if echo cancellation is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果轨道启用了回声消除功能，则为 true ;如果禁用回声消除，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if the transceiver's sender will no longer send data, and its receiver will no longer receive data. If either or both are still at work, the result is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果收发器的 sender 将不再发送数据，并且其 receiver 将不再接收数据，则为 true 。如果其中一个或两个仍在工作，则结果为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value which is true if voice activity is present in the most recently received RTP packet played by the associated source, or false if voice activity is not present.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果在关联的源播放的最近接收到的RTP数据包中存在语音活动，则为 true ;如果不存在语音活动，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the aspectRatio constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 aspectRatio 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the channelCount constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 channelCount 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the deviceId constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 deviceId 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the echoCancellation constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 echoCancellation 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the facingMode constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 facingMode 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the resizeMode constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 resizeMode 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the frameRate constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 frameRate 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the groupId constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前环境中支持 groupId 约束，则其值为 true 的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the height constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 height 限制，则该值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the latency constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 latency 约束，则该值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the sampleRate constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 sampleRate 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the sampleSize constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 sampleSize 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the volume constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 volume 约束，则该值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value whose value is true if the width constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 width 约束，则该值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value. The default, false, indicates that only the target node specified when calling MutationObserver.observe() is to be monitored for changes. Changing this value to true causes the entire subtree rooted at the specified target node to be monitored for the changes indicated by the other options.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值。默认 false ，表示仅监视在调用 MutationObserver.observe() 时指定的目标节点的更改。将此值更改为 true 会导致监视以指定目标节点为根的整个子树的其他选项所指示的更改。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which controls whether or not to import the entire DOM subtree of the <var>externalNode</var>.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，它控制是否导入 <var>externalNode</var> 的整个DOM子树。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which indicates a value the property must have.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值,表示该属性必须具有的值。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which indicates the current value of the autoGainControl property, which is true if automatic gain control is enabled and is false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔指示的当前值 autoGainControl 属性，这是 true ，如果启用了自动增益控制，是 false ，否则。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which indicates the current value of the noiseSupression property, which is true if noise suppression is enabled and is false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 布尔指示的当前值 noiseSupression 属性，这是 true ，如果启用了噪声抑制和是 false ，否则。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which is true if looping is enabled; otherwise, the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果启用了循环，则为 true ；否则为false。否则，值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which is true if the callback is running due to the callback's timeout period elapsing or false if the callback is running because the user agent is idle and is offering time to the callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果由于回调超时时间流逝而使回调正在运行，则为 true ;如果由于用户代理空闲并且正在为回调提供时间而正在运行回调，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which is true if the element is hidden from view; otherwise, the value is false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果元素从视图中隐藏，则为 true ;否则为false。否则，值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which is true if the event produces a character; otherwise false. Some keystroke combinations may raise events but not produce any character (example:
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果事件产生一个字符，则为 true ;否则为false。否则为 false 。某些按键组合可能会引发事件，但不会产生任何字符（例如：

trans-unit.source: A Boolean which, when set to true, tells createOffer() to generate and use new values for the identifying properties of the SDP it creates, resulting in a request that triggers renegotiation of the ICE connection. This is useful if network conditions have changed in a way that make the current configuration untenable or impractical, for instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，当设置为 true 时，它告诉 createOffer() 为其生成的SDP的标识属性生成并使用新值，从而导致触发ICE连接重新协商的请求。如果网络条件发生了变化，例如使当前配置变得不可行或不切实际，这将很有用。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean whose value is true if the autoGainControl constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果当前环境中支持 autoGainControl 约束，则其值为 true 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean whose value is true if the noiseSuppression constraint is supported in the current environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前环境中支持 noiseSuppression 约束，则其值为 true 的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean whose value is true if the callback is being executed because the timeout specified when the idle callback was installed has expired.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果正在执行回调，则该值为 true ，因为安装了空闲回调时指定的超时已到期。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean whose value of true if the track is enabled, that is allowed to render the media source stream; or false if it is disabled, that is not rendering the media source stream but silence and blackness. If the track has been disconnected, this value can be changed but has no more effect.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果启用了轨道，则其值为 true ，它允许呈现媒体源流；或 false (如果已禁用），即不呈现媒体源流，而是保持沉默和黑色。如果轨道已断开连接，则可以更改该值，但不再起作用。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean, which is true if the point is inside the area contained by the stroking of a path, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，如果该点在笔触路径包含的区域内，则为 true ，否则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean, which is true if the specified point is contained in the current or specified path, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 布尔值，如果指定点包含在当前或指定路径中，则为 true ，否则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: A CSS property to set.
trans-unit.target: 一个要设置的CSS属性。

trans-unit.source: A DOM Element.
trans-unit.target: DOM Element 。

trans-unit.source: A DOM Node (which may be an Element) within the DOM tree to watch for changes, or to be the root of a subtree of nodes to be watched.
trans-unit.target: DOM树中的DOM Node （可能是 Element ），用于监视更改，或者是要监视的节点子树的根。

trans-unit.source: A DOM event fired for a pointer.
trans-unit.target: DOM event 触发了一个指针。

trans-unit.source: A DOMString containg the ID.
trans-unit.target: 一个DOMString,连接ID。

trans-unit.source: A DXT1-compressed image in an RGB image format with a simple on/off alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 一个DXT1压缩的RGB图像格式的图像,具有一个简单的开/关alpha值。

trans-unit.source: A DXT1-compressed image in an RGB image format.
trans-unit.target: RGB图像格式的DXT1压缩图像。

trans-unit.source: A DXT1-compressed image in an sRGB image format with a simple on/off alpha value.
trans-unit.target: 一个DXT1压缩的sRGB图像格式的图像,具有一个简单的开/关alpha值。

trans-unit.source: A DXT1-compressed image in an sRGB image format.
trans-unit.target: 一个sRGB图像格式的DXT1压缩图像。

trans-unit.source: A DXT3-compressed image in an RGBA image format. Compared to a 32-bit RGBA texture, it offers 4:1 compression.
trans-unit.target: 一个DXT3压缩的RGBA图像格式的图像。与32位的RGBA纹理相比,它提供4:1的压缩。

trans-unit.source: A DXT3-compressed image in an sRGBA image format.
trans-unit.target: sRGBA图像格式的DXT3压缩图像。

trans-unit.source: A DXT5-compressed image in an RGBA image format. It also provides a 4:1 compression, but differs to the DXT3 compression in how the alpha compression is done.
trans-unit.target: 一个DXT5压缩的RGBA图像格式的图像。它也提供了4:1的压缩,但与DXT3压缩不同的是,它的alpha压缩是如何完成的。

trans-unit.source: A DXT5-compressed image in an sRGBA image format.
trans-unit.target: 以sRGBA图像格式压缩的DXT5图像。

trans-unit.source: A Firefox (Gecko)-specific parameter. If true, the listener receives synthetic events dispatched by web content (the default is false for browser chrome and true for regular web pages). This parameter is useful for code found in add-ons as well as the browser itself. See Interaction between privileged and non-privileged pages for an example.
trans-unit.target: Firefox（Gecko）特定的参数。如果 true ，侦听器能够接收合成事件出动的Web内容（默认是 false 的浏览器Chrome的和 true 定期网页）。该参数对于加载项中的代码以及浏览器本身很有用。有关示例，请参见特权页面和非特权页面之间的交互。

trans-unit.source: A HMAC algorithm takes a key and then generated a digest using this key and the data to sign. Later, the same digest can be recalculated by anybody with the key to check if the data has been altered in anyway. Although, by requiring the knowledge of a secret, it allows to store the digest along with the data: an attacker will not be able to create a digest representing tampered data without knowing the key.
trans-unit.target: HMAC算法需要一个密钥,然后用这个密钥和数据生成一个摘要来签名。之后,任何拥有密钥的人都可以重新计算相同的摘要,以检查数据是否有任何改变。虽然,由于需要知道一个秘密,它允许将摘要与数据一起存储:攻击者在不知道密钥的情况下,无法创建一个代表被篡改数据的摘要。

trans-unit.source: A Headers object also has an associated guard, which takes a value of immutable, request, request-no-cors, response, or none. This affects whether the set(), delete(), and append() methods will mutate the header. For more information see Guard.
trans-unit.target: Headers对象还具有关联的防护，该防护的值为 immutable ， request ， request-no-cors ， response 或 none 。这会影响 set() ， delete() 和 append() 方法是否会使标头发生突变。有关更多信息，请参阅Guard。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object that is the serialization of the Performance object.
trans-unit.target: 一个JSON对象，它是 Performance 对象的序列化。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object that is the serialization of the PerformanceEntry object.
trans-unit.target: 一个JSON对象，它是 PerformanceEntry 对象的序列化。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object that is the serialization of the PerformanceNavigationTiming object as a map with entries from the closest inherited interface and with entries for each of the serializable attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一个JSON对象，它是 PerformanceNavigationTiming 对象的序列化为映射，该映射包含来自最近的继承接口的条目以及每个可序列化属性的条目。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object that is the serialization of the PerformanceResourceTiming object as a map with entries from the closest inherited interface and with entries for each of the serializable attributes.
trans-unit.target: 一个JSON对象，它是 PerformanceResourceTiming 对象的序列化为映射，该映射包含来自最接近的继承接口的条目以及每个可序列化属性的条目。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object.
trans-unit.target: 一个JSON对象。

trans-unit.source: A JSON object. It currently only contains the subscription endpoint, as an endpoint member.
trans-unit.target: JSON对象。当前，它仅包含订阅终结点，作为 endpoint 成员。

trans-unit.source: A JSON-serializable object that provides optional information that might be needed by the supported payment methods. This has to conform to the structure defined in the BasicCardRequest dictionary.

trans-unit.source: A JSON-serializable object that provides optional information that might be needed by the supported payment methods. trans-unit.source: A Web page is a document. This document can be either displayed in the browser window or as the HTML source. But it is the same document in both cases. The Document Object Model (DOM) represents that same document so it can be manipulated. The DOM is an object-oriented representation of the web page, which can be modified with a scripting language such as JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 网页是一个文档。这个文档既可以显示在浏览器窗口中,也可以作为HTML源文件。但在这两种情况下,它都是同一个文档。文档对象模型(DOM)代表了同一个文档,所以它可以被操作。DOM是网页的面向对象的表示,它可以用脚本语言(如JavaScript)来修改。

trans-unit.source: A WebSocket server can be written in any server-side programming language that is capable of Berkeley sockets, such as C(++) or Python or even PHP and server-side JavaScript. This is not a tutorial in any specific language, but serves as a guide to facilitate writing your own server.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket服务器可以用任何支持Berkeley套接字的服务器端编程语言编写，例如C（++）或Python甚至PHP和服务器端JavaScript。这不是任何特定语言的教程，但可作为简化编写自己的服务器的指南。

trans-unit.source: A WebSocket server is a TCP application listening on any port of a server that follows a specific protocol, simple as that. The task of creating a custom server tends to scare people; however, it can be easy to implement a simple WebSocket server on your platform of choice.
trans-unit.target: WebSocket服务器是在服务器的任何端口上监听遵循特定协议的TCP应用程序,就这么简单。创建自定义服务器的任务往往会让人们感到害怕;但是,在您选择的平台上实现一个简单的WebSocket服务器是很容易的。

trans-unit.source: A WebSocket server is explained on a very low level here. WebSocket servers are often separate and specialized servers (for load-balancing or other practical reasons), so you will often use a reverse proxy (such as a regular HTTP server) to detect WebSocket handshakes, pre-process them, and send those clients to a real WebSocket server. This means that you don't have to bloat your server code with cookie and authentication handlers (for example).
trans-unit.target: WebSocket服务器的解释很低。WebSocket服务器通常是单独的专用服务器（出于负载平衡或其他实际原因），因此您将经常使用反向代理（例如常规HTTP服务器）来检测WebSocket握手，对其进行预处理并将这些客户端发送到真正的WebSocket服务器。这意味着您不必使用Cookie和身份验证处理程序来膨胀服务器代码。

trans-unit.source: A biquad filter is actually a specific type of infinite impulse response filter. It's a commonly-used type and we already have it as a node in the Web Audio API. If you choose this node the hard work is done for you. For instance, if you want to filter lower frequencies from your sound, you can set the type to highpass and then set which frequency to filter from (or cut off). There's more information on how biquad filters work here.
trans-unit.target: 双二阶滤波器实际上是无限冲激响应滤波器的一种特定类型。这是一种常用的类型，我们已经将其作为Web Audio API中的一个节点。如果选择此节点，那么辛勤的工作将为您完成。例如，如果要从声音中滤除较低频率，可以将类型设置为 highpass ，然后设置要从中滤除（或截断）的频率。这里有更多有关biquad滤波器工作原理的信息。

trans-unit.source: A common use for DocumentFragment is to create one, assemble a DOM subtree within it, then append or insert the fragment into the DOM using Node interface methods such as appendChild() or insertBefore(). Doing this moves the fragment's nodes into the DOM, leaving behind an empty DocumentFragment. Because all of the nodes are inserted into the document at once, only one reflow and render is triggered instead of potentially one for each node inserted if they were inserted separately.
trans-unit.target: DocumentFragment 的常见用法是创建一个，在其中组装DOM子树，然后使用 Node 接口方法（例如 appendChild() 或 insertBefore() )将片段追加或插入DOM中。这样做会将片段的节点移到DOM中，留下一个空的 DocumentFragment 。因为所有节点都立即插入到文档中，所以仅触发一个重排和渲染，而不是如果分别插入每个插入的节点，则可能触发一个重排和渲染。

trans-unit.source: A count of the total number of Full Intra Request (FIR) packets received by the sender. This statistic is only available to the device which is receiving the stream and is only available for video tracks. A FIR packet is sent by the receiving end of the stream when it falls behind or has lost packets and is unable to continue decoding the stream; the sending end of the stream receives the FIR packet and responds by sending a full frame instead of a delta frame, thereby letting the receiver "catch up." The higher this number is, the more often a problem of this nature arose, which can be a sign of network congestion or an overburdened receiving device.
trans-unit.target: 发送方收到的完整内部请求(FIR)数据包总数的统计。此统计仅适用于接收流的设备,并且仅适用于视频轨道。当流的接收端掉队或丢包,无法继续解码流时,流的接收端就会发送FIR包;流的发送端收到FIR包后,会以发送完整帧而不是三角帧的方式进行响应,从而让接收端 "迎头赶上"。这个数字越高,越经常出现这种性质的问题,这可能是网络拥堵或接收设备负担过重的信号。

trans-unit.target: 使用非对称密钥对代替密码的不可窃取和防数据泄露的非对称密钥对登录服务的凭证。

trans-unit.source: A cue is a single subtitle block that has a single start time, end time, and textual payload. Example 6 consists of the header, a blank line, and then five cues separated by blank lines. A cue consists of five components:

trans-unit.source: A cue text payload cannot contain the string "-->", the ampersand character (&), or the less-than sign (<). Instead use the escape sequence "&" for ampersand and "<" for less-than. It is also recommended that you use the greater-than escape sequence ">" instead of the greater-than character (>) to avoid confusion with tags. If you are using the WebVTT file for metadata these restrictions do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 提示文本有效内容不能包含字符串“ -->" ，与号字符（＆）或小于号（<）。而是使用转义序列“＆amp;” 代表“＆”和“＆lt;” 少于。还建议您使用大于转义序列“＆gt;”。而不是大于号（>），以避免与标签混淆。如果您将WebVTT文件用于元数据，则这些限制不适用。

trans-unit.source: A cue timing indicates when the cue is shown. It has a start and end time which are represented by timestamps. The end time must be greater than the start time, and the start time must be greater than or equal to all previous start times. Cues may have overlapping timings.
trans-unit.target: 提示时间表示何时显示提示。它有一个开始和结束时间,用时间戳表示。结束时间必须大于开始时间,而开始时间必须大于或等于之前所有的开始时间。提示可以有重叠的时间。

trans-unit.source: A data transfer may store multiple items, each at a given zero-based index. mozSetDataAt() may only be called with an index argument less than mozItemCount in which case an existing item is modified, or equal to mozItemCount in which case a new item is added, and the mozItemCount is incremented by one.
trans-unit.target: 数据传输可以存储多个项目，每个项目以给定的从零开始的索引为准。在这种情况下，只能使用小于 mozItemCount 的索引参数来调用 mozSetDataAt() ,在这种情况下，将修改现有项，或者在添加新项的情况下，等于 mozItemCount 的情况下，将添加新项，并且将 mozItemCount 递增1。

trans-unit.source: A data value by which stored values are organized and retrieved in the object store. The object store can derive the key from one of three sources: a key generator, a key path, or an explicitly specified value. The key must be of a data type that has a number that is greater than the one before it. Each record in an object store must have a key that is unique within the same store, so you cannot have multiple records with the same key in a given object store.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据值，通过该数据值在对象存储中组织和检索存储的值。对象存储库可以从以下三种来源之一获取密钥：密钥生成器，密钥路径或显式指定的值。密钥的数据类型必须大于其之前的数字。对象存储中的每个记录必须具有在同一存储中唯一的键，因此在给定的对象存储中不能有多个具有相同键的记录。

trans-unit.source: A database connection can have several active transactions associated with it at a time, so long as the writing transactions do not have overlapping scopes. The scope of transactions, which is defined at creation, determines which object stores the transaction can interact with and remains constant for the lifetime of the transaction. So, for example, if a database connection already has a writing transaction with a scope that just covers the flyingMonkey object store, you can start a second transaction with a scope of the unicornCentaur and unicornPegasus object stores. As for reading transactions, you can have several of them — even overlapping ones.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据库连接一次可以具有多个与其关联的活动事务，只要写入事务的作用域不重叠即可。在创建时定义的事务范围确定了事务可以与之交互的对象存储，并且在事务的整个生命周期中保持不变。因此，例如，如果数据库连接中已有一个写入事务，而该事务的作用域仅覆盖 flyingMonkey 对象存储，则可以使用 unicornCentaur 和 unicornPegasus 对象存储的作用域启动第二个事务。至于读取交易，您可以有多个交易-甚至是重叠交易。

A double value representing the maximum distance between the audio source and the listener, after which the volume is not reduced any further.

trans-unit.target: 一个双精度值，代表用于缩放FFT分析数据的最大分贝值，其中 0 dB是可能的最大声音， -10 dB是该值的十分之一， -30 类推。默认值为-30 dB。

trans-unit.source: A double, representing the minimum decibel value for scaling the FFT analysis data, where 0 dB is the loudest possible sound, -10 dB is a 10th of that, etc. The default value is -100 dB.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度值，代表用于缩放FFT分析数据的最小分贝值，其中 0 dB是可能的最大声音， -10 dB是该值的十分之一， -100 类推。默认值为-100 dB。

trans-unit.source: A double, representing the z-depth in meters; its initial value is 0.01.
trans-unit.target: 一个double，代表z深度（以米为单位）；其初始值为 0.01 。

trans-unit.source: A double, representing the z-depth in meters; its initial value is 10000.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个double，代表z深度（以米为单位）；其初始值为 10000.0 。

trans-unit.source: A double, with the offset amount expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个双倍,偏移量以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating point value indicating the current value of the aspectRatio property, specified precisely to 10 decimal places. This is the width of the image in pixels divided by its height in pixels. Common values include 1.3333333333 (for the classic televison 4:3 "standard" aspect ratio, also used on tablets such as Apple's iPad), 1.7777777778 (for the 16:9 high-definition widescreen aspect ratio), and 1.6 (for the 16:10 aspect ratio common among widescreen computers and tablets).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示 aspectRatio 属性的当前值，精确指定到小数点后10位。这是以像素为单位的图像宽度除以以像素为单位的高度。常见值包括1.3333333333（对于经典的电视4：3“标准”长宽比，也用于苹果iPad等平板电脑），1.7777777778（对于16：9高清晰度宽屏长宽比）和1.6（对于16：宽屏计算机和平板电脑常见的10种宽高比）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating point value indicating the current value of the frameRate property, specifying how many frames of video per second the track includes. If the value can't be determined for any reason, the value will match the vertical sync rate of the device the user agent is running on.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示 frameRate 属性的当前值，指定轨道每秒包含多少个视频帧。如果由于某种原因无法确定该值，则该值将与运行用户代理的设备的垂直同步速率匹配。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating point value indicating the current value of the latency property, specifying the audio latency, in seconds. Latency is the amount of time which elapses between the start of processing the audio and the data being available to the next stop in the audio utilization process. This value is a target value; actual latency may vary to some extent for various reasons.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示 latency 属性的当前值，以秒为单位指定音频延迟。延迟是指从开始处理音频到音频使用过程中下一站可用的数据之间经过的时间。该值是目标值；由于各种原因，实际延迟可能会有所不同。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating point value indicating the current value of the volume property, specifying the volume level of the track. This value will be between 0.0 (silent) to 1.0 (maximum supported volume).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示 volume 属性的当前值，指定轨道的音量级别。此值将介于0.0（静音）到1.0（最大支持音量）之间。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number indicating the current configuration of the track's aspect ratio. The aspect ratio is computed by taking the track's width, dividing by its height, and rounding the result to ten decimal places. For example, the standard 16:9 high-definition aspect ratio can be computed as 1920/1080, or 1.7777777778.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点数,表示当前轨道的长宽比配置。长宽比的计算方法是将轨道的宽度除以高度,然后将结果四舍五入到十位小数。例如,标准的 16:9 高清晰度宽高比可计算为 1920/1080,或 1.777777777778。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number indicating the current configuration of the track's frame rate, in frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点数,表示当前轨道帧率的配置,单位是每秒一帧。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number indicating the estimated latency, in seconds, of the audio track as currently configured.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点数,表示当前配置的音频轨道的估计延迟时间,以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number indicating the volume, from 0.0 to 1.0, of the audio track as currently configured.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点数,表示当前配置的音频轨道的音量,从0.0到1.0。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number specifying a specific, required, value the property must have to be considered acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度的浮点数,指定了一个特定的、需要的、被认为可以接受的属性值。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number specifying a value the property would ideally have, but which can be considered optional if necessary to find a match.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度的浮点数,指定了属性的理想值,但如果需要寻找匹配,它可以被认为是可选的。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point number which indicates the volume level of the audio in the most recently received RTP packet from the source described by the RTCRtpContributingSource.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点数，它表示最近从 RTCRtpContributingSource 描述的源接收到的RTP数据包中的音频的音量级别。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value between 0 and 1 specifying the audio level contained in the last RTP packet played from this source.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于0和1之间的双精度浮点值,用于指定从该源播放的最后一个RTP数据包中包含的音频电平。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the w perspective value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity). The default is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的w透视值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。默认值为1.0。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the y coordinate's value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的y坐标值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the z coordinate's value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的z坐标值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the point's w perspective value. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的w透视值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the point's y-coordinate. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 指示点的y坐标的双精度浮点值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the point's z-coordinate. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 指示该点的z坐标的双精度浮点值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the point's x coordinate. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 指示点的x坐标的双精度浮点值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the ratio of the display's resolution in physical pixels to the resolution in CSS pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值,表示显示器的物理像素分辨率与CSS像素分辨率的比例。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the x coordinate's value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的x坐标值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the y coordinate's value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的y坐标值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value indicating the z coordinate's value for the point. This value is unrestricted, meaning that it is allowed to be infinite or invalid (that is, its value may be NaN or ±Infinity).
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示该点的z坐标值。此值是无限制的，表示允许它是无限或无效的（即，它的值可以是 NaN 或 ±Infinity ）。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value specifying the maximum number of frames per second to allow for this encoding.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值,指定该编码允许的最大每秒帧数。

trans-unit.source: A double-precision floating-point value that indicates the rate of capture of each frame. If not set, a new frame will be captured each time the canvas changes; if set to 0, frames will not be captured automatically; instead, they will only be captured when the returned track's requestFrame() method is called.
trans-unit.target: 一个双精度浮点值，指示每个帧的捕获率。如果未设置，则每次更改画布时都会捕获一个新的帧；如果设置为 0 ，则不会自动捕获帧。而是仅在调用返回的轨道的 requestFrame() 方法时捕获它们。

trans-unit.source: A double.
trans-unit.target: 一个双倍。

trans-unit.source: A double. 1.0 is "normal speed," values lower than 1.0 make the media play slower than normal, higher values make it play faster.
trans-unit.target: 一个双倍。1.0为 "正常速度",数值低于1.0,媒体播放速度会比正常速度慢,数值越高,播放速度越快。

trans-unit.source: A double. 1.0 is "normal speed," values lower than 1.0 make the media play slower than normal, higher values make it play faster. The value 0.0 is invalid and throws a NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR exception.
trans-unit.target: 一双。1.0是“正常速度”，低于1.0的值会使媒体播放速度比正常速度慢，较高的值会使媒体播放速度加快。值0.0无效，并引发 NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: A double. A value in seconds is expected.
trans-unit.target: 一个双倍。希望有一个以秒为单位的数值。

trans-unit.source: A double. If the media data is available but the length is unknown, this value is NaN. If the media is streamed and has no predefined length, the value is Inf.
trans-unit.target: 一双。如果媒体数据可用，但长度未知，则此值为 NaN 。如果流媒体并且没有预定义的长度，则该值为 Inf 。

trans-unit.source: A double. The default is 0, and its value can be in the range 0–1.
trans-unit.target: 一双。默认值为 0 ，其值可以在0–1的范围内。

trans-unit.source: A double. The default is 10000, and non-positive values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 一双。默认值为 10000 ，并且不允许使用非正值。

trans-unit.source: A drag may include data items of several different types. This allows data to be provided in more specific types, often custom types, yet still provide fallback data for drop targets that do not support more specific types. It is usually the case that the least specific type will be normal text data using the type text/plain. This data will be a simple textual representation.
trans-unit.target: 拖动可以包括几种不同类型的数据项。这允许以更特定的类型（通常是自定义类型）提供数据，但仍为不支持更特定类型的放置目标提供回退数据。通常，最不明确的类型是使用text / plain类型的普通文本数据。此数据将是一个简单的文本表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A drop can occur inside the same window or over another application. The dragend event will always fire regardless. The event's screenX and screenY properties will be set to the screen coordinate where the drop occurred.
trans-unit.target: 拖放可能发生在同一窗口内或另一个应用程序上。该 dragend 事件将永远不分火。事件的 screenX 和 screenY 属性将设置为发生放置的屏幕坐标。

trans-unit.source: A enum — see DistanceModelType.
trans-unit.target: 枚举—请参见 DistanceModelType 。

trans-unit.source: A enum — see PanningModelType.
trans-unit.target: 枚举—请参阅 PanningModelType 。

trans-unit.source: A enum — see DistanceModelType.
A enum — see PanningModelType.
A enumerated value representing a channelCountMode.
trans-unit.target: 代表channelCountMode的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: A enumerated value representing a channelCountMode.
A few parameters are now optional (listener), or accepts the null value (useCapture).
trans-unit.target: 现在有几个参数是可选的（ listener ），或者接受 null 值（ useCapture ）。

trans-unit.source: A float indicating the total length of the path in user units.
trans-unit.target: 表示路径总长度的浮点数,以用户为单位。

trans-unit.source: A float referring to the distance along the path.
trans-unit.target: 指沿途距离的浮子。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the amount of tangential pressure applied to the pointer.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮子,表示施加在指针上的切向压力。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the depth in meters.
trans-unit.target: 代表深度的浮子,单位是米。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the number.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表数字的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the pitch value. It can range between 0 (lowest) and 2 (highest), with 1 being the default pitch for the current platform or voice. Some speech synthesis engines or voices may constrain the minimum and maximum rates further. If SSML is used, this value will be overridden by prosody tags in the markup.
trans-unit.target: 代表音高值的浮点数。它的范围可以在0（最低）和2（最高）之间，其中1是当前平台或语音的默认音高。一些语音合成引擎或语音可能会进一步限制最小和最大速率。如果使用SSML，则该值将被标记中的prosody标签覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the pitch value. It can range between 0 (lowest) and 2 (highest), with 1 being the default pitch for the current platform or voice. Some speech synthesis engines or voices may constrain the minimum and maximum rates further. If SSML is used, this value will be overridden by prosody tags in the markup.

A float representing the rate value. It can range between 0.1 (lowest) and 10 (highest), with 1 being the default pitch for the current platform or voice, which should correspond to a normal speaking rate. Other values act as a percentage relative to this, so for example 2 is twice as fast, 0.5 is half as fast, etc.
trans-unit.target: 一个代表速率值的浮点数。它的范围可以在0.1(最低)和10(最高)之间,1是当前平台或语音的默认音调,应该相当于正常的说话速度。其他值作为相对于此的百分比,例如2是速度的两倍,0.5是速度的一半,等等。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the size of a pixel unit along the y-axis of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 代表沿视口Y轴的像素单位大小的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the size of the pixel unit (as defined by CSS2) along the x-axis of the viewport, which represents a unit somewhere in the range of 70dpi to 120dpi, and, on systems that support this, might actually match the characteristics of the target medium. On systems where it is impossible to know the size of a pixel, a suitable default pixel size is provided.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数,代表沿视口x轴的像素单位的大小(由CSS2定义),它代表的单位范围是70dpi到120dpi,在支持这个的系统上,实际上可能与目标介质的特性相匹配。在无法知道像素大小的系统上,会提供一个合适的默认像素大小。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the weight of the grammar relative to other grammars present in the SpeechGrammarList. The weight means the importance of this grammar, or the likelihood that it will be recognised by the speech recognition service. The value can be between 0.0 and 1.0; If not specified, the default used is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 代表语法相对于 SpeechGrammarList 中存在的其他语法的权重的浮点数。权重表示此语法的重要性，或语音识别服务将识别该语法的可能性。该值可以在 0.0 到 1.0 之间；如果未指定，则使用的默认值为 1.0 。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the weight of the grammar, in the range 0.0–1.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，表示语法的权重，范围为0.0-1.0。

trans-unit.source: A float representing the width in meters.
trans-unit.target: 表示宽度的浮子,单位为米。

trans-unit.source: A float specifying the amount of the offset. Initially 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指定偏移量。最初是 0.0 。

trans-unit.source: A float specifying the distance that shadows will be offset horizontally. The default value is 0. Infinity and NaN values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指定阴影将在水平方向偏移的距离。默认值为 0 。 Infinity 和 NaN 值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A float specifying the distance that shadows will be offset vertically. The default value is 0. Infinity and NaN values are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指定阴影将在垂直方向偏移的距离。默认值为 0 。 Infinity 和 NaN 值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A float that represents the volume value, between 0 (lowest) and 1 (highest.)
trans-unit.target: 代表体积值的浮点数,介于0(最低)和1(最高)之间。

trans-unit.source: A float.
trans-unit.target: 一个漂浮物。

trans-unit.source: A floating point Number for floating point values (methods with "f").
trans-unit.target: 浮点 Number 为浮点值（以“f”的方法）。

trans-unit.source: A floating point Number for the vertex attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 浮点 Number 为顶点属性值。

trans-unit.source: A floating point number indicating the audio context's sample rate, in samples per second.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数,表示音频上下文的采样率,以每秒的采样率为单位。

trans-unit.source: A floating point number representing the value the AudioParam will ramp to by the given time.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，表示 AudioParam 将在给定时间之前逐渐增加到的值。

trans-unit.source: A floating point number representing the value the AudioParam will change to at the given time.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数,代表AudioParam在给定时间内将改变的值。

trans-unit.source: A floating point number.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point Number indicating the maximum value permitted for the parameter's nominal range.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点 Number 表示最大值允许的参数的额定范围。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point Number indicating the minimum value permitted for the parameter's nominal range.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点 Number 指示的最小值允许的参数的额定范围。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point Number indicating the parameter's value. This value will be between the values specified by the minValue and maxValue properties.
trans-unit.target: 浮点 Number 指示参数的值。此值将介于 minValue 和 maxValue 属性指定的值之间。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point Number.
trans-unit.target: 浮点 Number 。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number indicating the duration, in seconds, to be played. If no value is passed then the duration will be equal to the length of the audio buffer minus the offset value
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数,表示要播放的持续时间,以秒为单位。如果没有传递数值,那么持续时间将等于音频缓冲区的长度减去偏移值。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number indicating the offset, in seconds, into the audio buffer at which each loop should begin during playback. This value is only used when the loop parameter is true.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指示到音频缓冲区的偏移量（以秒为单位），在播放过程中每个循环应从该缓冲区开始。仅当 loop 参数为 true 时，才使用此值。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number indicating the offset, in seconds, into the audio buffer at which each loop will loop return to the beginning of the loop (that is, the current play time gets reset to AudioBufferSourceNode.loopStart). This property is only used if the loop property is true.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指示进入每个循环的音频缓冲区的偏移量（以秒为单位），返回到循环的开头（即，当前播放时间重置为 AudioBufferSourceNode.loopStart ）。仅当 loop 属性为 true 时,才使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number indicating the offset, in seconds, into the audio buffer where playback should begin. If 0 is passed then the playback will start from the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数,表示在音频缓冲区的偏移量,以秒为单位,从哪里开始播放。如果通过0,则播放将从头开始。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number indicating the time, in seconds, at which playback of the AudioBuffer stops and loops back to the time indicated by loopStart, if loop is true. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，以秒为单位，指示 AudioBuffer 的播放停止的时间（ loopStart ，如果 loop 为 true ，则循环返回由loopStart指示的时间。默认值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number of pixels from the left edge of the document at which the mouse was clicked, regardless of any scrolling or viewport positioning that may be in effect.
trans-unit.target: 从文档左边缘单击鼠标起的浮点数像素，无论可能进行的任何滚动或视口位置如何。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number representing the current time in milliseconds, or null if no time is set. You can read this value to determine what the start time is currently set at, and you can change this value to make the animation start at a different time.
trans-unit.target: 代表当前时间的浮点数（以毫秒为单位）；如果未设置时间，则为 null 。您可以读取该值以确定当前的开始时间，也可以更改此值以使动画在其他时间开始。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point number specifying the number of pixels the Document is scrolled vertically within its containing Window. This number is subpixel precise, so it may not be an integer. A value of 0.0 indicates that the window is not scrolled vertically, and that the top of the document is located at the top edge of the window's content area.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点数，指定 Document 在其包含的 Window 中垂直滚动的像素数。此数字精确到亚像素，因此它可能不是整数。值为0.0表示该窗口未垂直滚动，并且文档的顶部位于该窗口的内容区域的顶部边缘。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value indicating the current smaple rate of the buffer's data, in samples per second.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值,表示当前缓冲区数据的采样率,以每秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value indicating the time, in seconds, at which playback of the AudioBuffer must begin when loop is true. Its default value is 0 (meaning that at the beginning of each loop, playback begins at the start of the audio buffer).
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值，表示在 loop 为 true 时必须开始播放 AudioBuffer 的时间（以秒为单位）。它的默认值是 0 （表示在每个循环的开始，从音频缓冲区的开始开始播放）。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the largest permissible value of the property it describes.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值,指定其描述的属性的最大允许值。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the number of times the animation sequence will play through. Any value from 0 (don't play the animation at all) to positive Infinity (run the animation indefinitely) is supported. Defaults to 1, meaning the animation sequence plays through once then stops automatically.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值，指定动画序列将播放的次数。支持从0（根本不播放动画）到正 Infinity （无限期运行动画）的任何值。默认值为1，表示动画序列播放一次，然后自动停止。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the smallest permissible value of the property it describes.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值,指定它所描述的属性的最小允许值。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value whose value is at least 0 and is not +Infinity, indicating the offset into the number of iterations the animation sequence is to run at which to start animating. iterationStart represents the iteration index at which the animation effect begins as well as its progress through that iteration.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值，其值至少为0且不是 +Infinity ，指示开始动画的动画序列要运行的迭代次数的偏移量。 iterationStart 表示动画效果开始的迭代索引及其在该迭代过程中的进度。

trans-unit.source: A fragment or vertex WebGLShader.
trans-unit.target: 片段或顶点 WebGLShader 。

trans-unit.source: A free-form identifier for this payment request. If a value is not supplied, the browser will construct one.
trans-unit.target: 此付款请求的自由格式标识符。如果没有提供一个值,浏览器将构建一个值。

trans-unit.source: A frozen Array of available storage types.
trans-unit.target: 可用存储类型的冻结 Array 。

trans-unit.source: A full list of the steps for validating an assertion can be found in the WebAuthn specification. Assuming the validation is successful, the server will note that the user is now authenticated. This is outside the scope of the WebAuthn specification, but one option would be to drop a new cookie for the user session.
trans-unit.target: 可以在WebAuthn规范中找到用于验证断言的步骤的完整列表。假设验证成功，服务器将注意到用户现在已通过身份验证。这不在WebAuthn规范的范围内，但是一种选择是为用户会话删除新的cookie。

trans-unit.source: A function matching the signature RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback which gets called if the description can't be set. It is passed a single DOMException object explaining why the request failed.
trans-unit.target: 匹配签名 RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback 的函数，如果无法设置描述，则调用该函数。它传递了一个 DOMException 对象，解释了请求失败的原因。

trans-unit.source: A function matching the signautre RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback which gets called if the description can't be set. It is passed a single DOMException object explaining why the request failed.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法设置描述，则调用与signautre RTCPeerConnectionErrorCallback 匹配的函数。它传递了一个 DOMException 对象，解释了请求失败的原因。

trans-unit.source: A function or function reference representing the callback function you want to remove. In the original implementation, the callback was a non-standard MediaQueryListListener object. In the new implementation the standard event mechanism is used, and the callback is a standard function.
trans-unit.target: 表示要删除的回调函数的函数或函数引用。在原始实现中，回调是非标准的 MediaQueryListListener 对象。在新的实现中，使用了标准事件机制，而回调是一个标准函数。

trans-unit.source: A function or function reference representing the callback function you want to run when the media query status changes. In the original implementation, the callback was a non-standard MediaQueryListListener object. In the new implementation the standard event mechanism is used, the callback is a standard function, and the event object is a MediaQueryListEvent, which inherits from Event.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在媒体查询状态更改时运行的回调函数的函数或函数引用。在原始实现中，回调是非标准的 MediaQueryListListener 对象。在新的实现中，使用了标准事件机制，回调是标准函数，事件对象是 MediaQueryListEvent ，它继承自 Event 。

trans-unit.source: A function that is called whenever an event of the specified type occurs.
trans-unit.target: 每当指定类型的事件发生时就会被调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called if an error occurs while attempting to remove the directory subtree. Receives a FileError describing the error which occurred as input.
trans-unit.target: 尝试删除目录子树时发生错误时要调用的函数。接收描述发生为输入的错误的 FileError 。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called if attempting to add the ICE candidate fails. Receives as input a DOMException object describing why failure occurred.
trans-unit.target: 尝试添加ICE候选者时调用的函数失败。接收描述故障原因的 DOMException 对象作为输入。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called to handle the finish event, or null if no finish event handler is set.
trans-unit.target: 被调用的函数来处理 finish 事件，或 null ，如果没有 finish 事件处理程序设置。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the RTCIceTransport object's gathering state changes. To determine the new state, examine the value of gatheringState.
trans-unit.target: RTCIceTransport 对象的收集状态更改时要调用的函数。要确定新的状态，检查的价值 gatheringState 。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the ended event is fired, indicating that the node has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 触发 ended 事件时将调用的函数，指示节点已完成播放。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called when the ICE candidate has been successfully added. This function receives no input parameters and doesn't return a value.
trans-unit.target: 当成功添加ICE候选者时调用的函数。该函数不接收输入参数,也不返回值。

trans-unit.source: A function to be called whenever an error occurs during the recorder's lifetime. In addition to other general errors that might occur, the following errors are specifically possible when using the MediaStream Recording API; to determine which occurred, check the value of MediaRecorderErrorEvent.error.name.
trans-unit.target: 在记录器的使用寿命期间发生错误时要调用的功能。除了可能发生的其他一般错误之外，使用MediaStream Recording API时，以下错误特别有可能发生；要确定发生了什么，请检查 MediaRecorderErrorEvent.error.name 的值。

trans-unit.source: A function to be executed when the animation is cancelled, or null if there is no cancel event handler.
trans-unit.target: 取消动画时要执行的函数；如果没有 cancel 事件处理程序，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A function to call once the directory removal process has completed. The callback has no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 目录删除过程完成后调用的函数。回调函数没有参数。

trans-unit.source: A function to serve as an EventHandler for the ended event. The event handler function receives a single parameter: the event object, which is a simple Event object.
trans-unit.target: 该功能可以作为一个 EventHandler 对 ended 的事件。事件处理程序函数接收一个参数：事件对象，它是一个简单的 Event 对象。

trans-unit.source: A function to serve as an EventHandler for the mute event. The event handler function receives a single parameter: the event object, which is a simple Event object.
trans-unit.target: 该功能可以作为一个 EventHandler 的 mute 事件。事件处理程序函数接收一个参数：事件对象，它是一个简单的 Event 对象。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called by the browser when the connectionstatechange event occurs on the RTCPeerConnection. The function receives as input a single parameter, which is an object of type Event. The event object contains no special information of note; you can look at the value of the peer connection's connectionState property to determine what the new state is.
trans-unit.target: 当 RTCPeerConnection 上发生 connectionstatechange 事件时，浏览器将调用此函数。该函数接收单个参数作为输入，该参数是 Event 类型的对象。事件对象不包含注释的特殊信息。您可以查看对等连接的 connectionState 属性的值，以确定新状态是什么。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called by the browser when the ended event occurs on the AudioScheduledSourceNode. The function receives as input a single parameter, which is an object of type Event describing the event that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 这是由浏览器时调用的函数 ended 事件的发生 AudioScheduledSourceNode 。该函数将单个参数作为输入接收，该参数是 Event 类型的对象，描述发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called once the file has been successfully removed.
trans-unit.target: 文件被成功删除后调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when a tonechange event is sent to the RTCDTMFSender, indicating that a DTMF tone has either started playing, or if all tones have finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 在将 tonechange 事件发送到 RTCDTMFSender 时调用的函数，该事件指示DTMF音调已开始播放或所有音调都已播放完毕。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the close event is fired.
trans-unit.target: 触发 close 事件时调用的函数。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the copy operation is succesfully completed. Receives a single input parameter: a Metadata object with information about the file.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成复制操作时调用的功能。接收一个输入参数：一个包含有关文件信息的 Metadata 对象。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the copy operation is succesfully completed. Receives a single input parameter: a FileSystemEntry based object providing the copied item's new details.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成复制操作时调用的功能。接收一个输入参数：一个基于 FileSystemEntry 的对象，提供复制的项目的新详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the directory's contents have been retrieved. The function receives a single input parameter: an array of file system entry objects, each based on FileSystemEntry. Generally, they are either FileSystemFileEntry objects, which represent standard files, or FileSystemDirectoryEntry objects, which represent directories. If there are no files left, or you've already called readEntries() on this FileSystemDirectoryReader, the array is empty.
trans-unit.target: 检索目录内容时调用的函数。该函数接收单个输入参数：文件系统入口对象的数组，每个对象基于 FileSystemEntry 。一般情况下，他们要么 FileSystemFileEntry 对象，代表标准的文件，或 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 对象，它代表目录。如果没有剩余文件，或者您已经在此 FileSystemDirectoryReader 上调用了 readEntries() ，则数组为空。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the move operation is succesfully completed. Receives a single input parameter: a FileSystemEntry based object providing the moved item's new details.
trans-unit.target: 成功完成移动操作时调用的功能。接收一个输入参数：一个基于 FileSystemEntry 的对象，提供移动项目的新详细信息。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the parent directory entry has been retrieved. The callback receives a single input parameter: a FileSystemDirectoryEntry object representing the parent directory. The parent of the root directory is considered to be the root directory, itself, so be sure to watch for that.
trans-unit.target: 检索父目录条目时调用的函数。回调接收一个输入参数：代表父目录的 FileSystemDirectoryEntry 对象。根目录的父目录本身就是根目录，因此请务必注意。

trans-unit.source: A function which is called when the percentage of the target element is visible crosses a threshold. The callback receives as input two parameters:
trans-unit.target: 当目标元素的可见百分比超过阈值时调用的函数。回调函数接收两个参数作为输入。

trans-unit.source: A function which the browser will call to handle the bufferedamountlow event. This function receives as its only input parameter a simple Event object representing the event which has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将调用该函数来处理 bufferedamountlow 事件。此函数将代表已发生事件的简单 Event 对象作为其唯一输入参数。

trans-unit.source: A function which the browser will call to handle the close event. The function receives as its sole input parameter the event itself, as an object of type Event.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将调用该函数来处理 close 事件。该函数将事件本身作为 Event 类型的对象作为其唯一输入参数。

trans-unit.source: A function which the browser will call to handle the error event when it occurs on the data channel. This function receives as its only input an ErrorEvent object describing the event which was received. That event object, in turn, describes the error that took place.
trans-unit.target: 当数据通道上发生 error 事件时，浏览器将调用该函数来处理错误事件。此函数仅将描述接收到的事件的 ErrorEvent 对象作为其输入。该事件对象依次描述了发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: A function which the browser will call to handle the message event. The function receives as its sole input parameter a MessageEvent object describing the event.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将调用该函数来处理 message 事件。该函数接收描述事件的 MessageEvent 对象作为其唯一输入参数。

trans-unit.source: A function which the browser will call to handle the open event. The function receives as its only input parameter the event itself, of type Event.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器将调用该函数来处理 open 事件。该函数将 Event 类型的事件本身作为其唯一的输入参数。

trans-unit.source: A function which will be called on each DOM change that qualifies given the targeted node or subtree and options. The callback function takes as input two parameters: an array of MutationRecord objects describing each change that occurred and the MutationObserver which invoked the callback. See the example below for more details.
trans-unit.target: 在给定目标节点或子树和选项的情况下，每次DOM更改都将调用的函数，该函数有资格。回调函数采用两个参数作为输入：描述所发生的每个更改的 MutationRecord 对象的数组以及调用回调的 MutationObserver 。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: A function you provide which accepts as input a Event object describing the devicechange event that occurred. There is no information about the change included in the event object; to get the updated list of devices, you'll have to use enumerateDevices().
trans-unit.target: 您提供的函数接受一个 Event 对象作为输入，该对象描述发生的设备 devicechange 事件。没有关于事件对象中包含的更改的信息。要获取设备的更新列表，您必须使用 enumerateDevices() 。

trans-unit.source: A function you provide which is passed a single parameter: an Event object containing the icegatheringstatechange event. You can determine the new state of ICE gathering by looking at the value of the RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState property.
trans-unit.target: 您提供的函数将传递一个参数：一个包含 icegatheringstatechange 事件的 Event 对象。您可以通过查看 RTCPeerConnection.iceGatheringState 属性的值来确定ICE收集的新状态。

trans-unit.source: A fundamental feature of this API is to allow the manipulation and storage of private and secret keys without requiring the underlying bits of the key to be made available to JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 这个API的一个基本特征是允许操作和存储私钥和秘钥,而不需要将密钥的底层位提供给JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: A fundamental requirement of web performance is a precise and consistent definition of time. The DOMHighResTimeStamp type (a double) is used by all performance interfaces to hold such time values. Additionally, there must be a way to create a timestamp for a specific point in time; this is done with the now() method.
trans-unit.target: Web性能的基本要求是对时间进行精确且一致的定义。所述 DOMHighResTimeStamp 型（ double ）用于由所有性能的接口来保存这样的时间值。此外，必须有一种方法可以为特定时间点创建时间戳。这是通过 now() 方法完成的。

trans-unit.source: A general description of a payment error from which the user may attempt to recover by retrying the payment, possibly after correcting mistakes in the payment information. error can be provided all by itself to provide only a generic error message, or in concert with the other properties to serve as an overview while other properties' values gude the user to errors in specific fields in the payment form.
trans-unit.target: 用户可能会在更正支付信息中的错误之后通过重试支付来尝试从中恢复的支付错误的一般说明。 error 可以单独提供，仅提供一般错误消息，也可以与其他属性一起用作概述，而其他属性的值则使用户感到付款表格中特定字段中的错误。

trans-unit.source: A given RTCPeerConnection can have multiple media tracks sent or received on it. When you wish to transmit DTMF signals, you first need to decide which track to send them on, since DTMF is sent as a series of out-of-band payloads on the RTCRtpSender responsible for transmitting that track's data to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 给定的 RTCPeerConnection 可以在其上发送或接收多个媒体轨道。当您希望传输DTMF信号时，您首先需要确定要在哪个轨道上发送它们，因为DTMF是在 RTCRtpSender 上作为一系列带外有效负载发送的，负责将那个轨道的数据传输到另一个对等方。

trans-unit.source: A global scope object (differs depending on the type of worker you are dealing with, as indicated above).
trans-unit.target: 一个全局作用域对象(根据您处理的工人类型不同,如上所述)。

trans-unit.source: A global variable, window, representing the window in which the script is running, is exposed to JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: 全局变量 window 代表JavaScript代码在其中运行，该窗口在其中运行脚本。

trans-unit.source: A good example for this is when you are using an image tag, and need to specify a backup image in case the one you need is not available on the server for any reason.
trans-unit.target: 一个很好的例子是,当您使用图像标签时,需要指定一个备份映像,以防您需要的映像因任何原因在服务器上不可用。

trans-unit.source: A good example of how to do animations using keyboard controls.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很好的例子,说明如何使用键盘控件做动画。

trans-unit.source: A good use case for headers is checking whether the content type is correct before you process it further. For example:
trans-unit.target: 头信息的一个很好的用例是在进一步处理之前检查内容类型是否正确。比如说

trans-unit.source: A good way to visualise these nodes is by drawing an audio graph so you can visualize it. This is what our current audio graph looks like:
trans-unit.target: 将这些节点可视化的一个好方法就是画一个音频图,这样你就可以将其可视化。这就是我们当前的音频图的样子。

trans-unit.source: A group of selectors to match the descendant elements of the ElementbaseElement against; this must be valid CSS syntax, or a SyntaxError exception will occur. The first element found which matches this group of selectors is returned.
trans-unit.target: 一组选择器，用于匹配 Element baseElement 的后代元素；这必须是有效的CSS语法，否则会发生 SyntaxError 异常。返回与该选择器组匹配的第一个元素。

trans-unit.source: A guide to how WebRTC connections work and how the various protocols and interfaces can be used together to build powerful communication apps.
trans-unit.target: 指导WebRTC连接如何工作,以及如何将各种协议和接口一起使用,以构建强大的通信应用程序。

trans-unit.source: A guide to using WebGL extensions.
trans-unit.target: WebGL扩展的使用指南。

trans-unit.source: A guide to variables, buffers, and other types of data used when writing WebGL code.
trans-unit.target: 编写WebGL代码时使用的变量、缓冲区和其他类型数据的指南。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the abort event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: abort 事件的处理程序。每次中止读取操作都会触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the chargingchange event; This event is sent when the battery charging state is updated.
trans-unit.target: chargingchange 事件的处理程序；电池充电状态更新时发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the chargingtimechange event; This event is sent when the battery charging time is updated
trans-unit.target: chargingtimechange 事件的处理程序；更新电池充电时间时发送此事件

trans-unit.source: A handler for the click event. It is triggered each time the user clicks on the notification.
trans-unit.target: click 事件的处理程序。每次用户单击通知时都会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the close event. It is triggered when the user closes the notification.
trans-unit.target: close 事件的处理程序。当用户关闭通知时触发。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the dischargingtimechange event; This event is sent when the battery discharging time is updated.
trans-unit.target: dischargingtimechange 事件的处理程序；当电池放电时间更新时，将发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the error event. It is triggered each time the notification encounters an error.
trans-unit.target: error 事件的处理程序。每次通知遇到错误时都会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: A handler for the error event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation encounter an error.
trans-unit.target: error 事件的处理程序。每当读取操作遇到错误时，都会触发此事件。
